system.description: The handheld Laser Welder uses a focused laser beam to perform cutting and welding operations. It can cut through a reinforced bulkhead in 1D starship combat rounds (6-36 minutes). Roll Repair/DEX 10+ to reduce the time to one starship combat round (6 minutes) As a weapon, the laser welder is inaccurate and clumsy, but extremely dangerous: it does 4D damage with a range of 1/5 and has energy for 5 “shots.” As a weapon, the welder also has the Fire aspect.
system.shortdescr: Handheld laser to perform cutting and welding operations
